skillsDescription: - Experience with Statistics/Analytics/Data - Experience with SQL,  R and be familiar with one of the programming languages: Java,  Pyton or Scala - German and English speaking skills
companyDescription: MRL Group was founded in 1997 as Microscape Recruitment Ltd and is a group of niche specialist international recruitment companies working within Technology,  Energy and Financial marketplaces.    Working from offices in the UK,  France and Germany we offer a dedicated,  professional and ethical recruitment service to firms of all sizes.    MRL CG help clients and candidates to go further
description: My client who are a global leader in the Data Warehouse,  Big Data and Analytics space are looking for a Data Scientist to join their growing team in Germany .  The role will: - Create concepts and implement analytics solutions - Conduct data mining - Creative predictive models - Conduct ad hoc analytics - Supporting sales teams - Developing new solution offers - Presentations / Demonstrations
